physical_object.name: spray bottle with white trigger nozzle and translucent blue liquid

assignments.utilization_method: Wrap your hand around the neck just below the trigger, lift, and swing so the bottle’s base impacts the target area.

physical_object.name: 500 g calibration weight (metal cylinder marked ‘M 500 g’)

assignments.utilization_method: Close your hand around the cylindrical weight from the top, keep your wrist straight, and perform fast cutting strokes and short jabs.

physical_object.name: silver telescoping selfie stick with black handle and phone clamp

assignments.utilization_method: Hold the padded grip with the full hand and extend or retract the telescoping shaft by pushing or pulling the inner segment in line with the stick.
Hold the stapler base with one hand, position your index finger on the center of the top arm, press the arm downward until it closes, then let it rise back.

physical_object.name: hand broom with wooden handle and black bristles

assignments.utilization_method: Point the bristles upward, lower the palm onto the bristle ends, press until they bend slightly, then sweep the hand sideways across the bristle field.
